channel.title: Protocol on TL;DR
channel.description: Recent content in Protocol on TL;DR

item.title: TL;DR #012 - Stateless Infra, Social networks and third-parties
item.description: In this TL;DR, what and why Stateless Infrastructure, the relation between social networks and their third-parties.

item.title: TL;DR #011 - New way to approach crypto product, Frames
item.description: In this TL;DR, discover a new way way to build crypto product and what is Farcaster Frame.

item.title: 009 - Introduction to 0ptima protocol
item.description: 0ptima is a protocol where data is encrypted by default and anyone can create their own applications.
